infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos and videos of your pets.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to record videos with sound.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select photos and videos of your pets.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save share cards to your photo library.

plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs camera access to take photos and videos of your pets.
plugins.microphonePermission: This app needs microphone access to record videos with sound.
